events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the product has multiple scratches and looks damaged. I am very disappointed with the condition it arrived in.
The system has detected keywords indicating a product defect issue, categorizing this case under Product Defect for further handling.
A customer support agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the damaged product you reported.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the scratches on your product. I’ll do my best to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and the packaging, so we can better assess the damage?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratches on the item as well as the box it came in. Please let me know what the next step is.
Thank you for the photos. We can either send you a replacement or issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thank you. I’m hoping the next one arrives in good condition.
We have processed your replacement order and it should arrive within 5 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
We’re following up to ensure that you have received your replacement product and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and for allowing us to resolve your issue.
